      • getSampleSpecificPage

        @RequestMapping({"/samples/{sampleId}/details","/projects/{projectId}/samples/{sampleId}/details"})
public String getSampleSpecificPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                    @PathVariable
                                    Long sampleId)
        Get the samples details page.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model
        sampleId - The id for the sample
        Returns:
        The name of the page.

      • getSampleDetails

        @RequestMapping(value="/samples",
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public SampleDetails getSampleDetails​(@RequestParam
                                      Long id)
        Get Sample details for a specific sample.
        Parameters:
        id - Long identifier for a sample.
        Returns:
        SampleDetails for the Sample

                method=GET)

                                        @PathVariable
                                        Long sampleId)

      • updateSample

        @RequestMapping(value={"/samples/{sampleId}/edit","/projects/{projectId}/samples/{sampleId}/edit"},
                method=POST)
public String updateSample​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                           @PathVariable
                           Long sampleId,
                           @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                           Date collectionDate,
                           @RequestParam(name="metadata")
                           String metadataString,
                           @RequestParam
                           Map<String,​String> params,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Update the details of a sample
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model
        sampleId - The id for the sample
        collectionDate - Date the sample was collected (Optional)
        metadataString - A JSON string representation of the MetadataEntry to set on the sample
        params - Map of fields to update. See FIELDS.
        request - a reference to the current request.
        Returns:
        The name of the details page.

      • getSampleFiles

        @RequestMapping("/projects/{projectId}/samples/{sampleId}/sequenceFiles")
public String getSampleFiles​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                             @PathVariable
                             Long projectId,
                             @PathVariable
                             Long sampleId)
        Get the page that shows the files belonging to that sample.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model
        projectId - the id of the Project the sample is in
        sampleId - Sample id
        Returns:
        a Map representing all files (pairs and singles) for the sample.

      • downloadAssembly

        @RequestMapping("/samples/download/{sampleId}/assembly/{assemblyId}")
public void downloadAssembly​(@PathVariable
                             Long sampleId,
                             @PathVariable
                             Long assemblyId,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                      throws IOException
        Downloads an GenomeAssembly associated with a sample.
        Parameters:
        sampleId - Id for the sample containing the assembly to download.
        assemblyId - The id for the assembly.
        response - HttpServletResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - if we can't write the file to the response.

                                           Long sampleId)

      • getCorrectSampleFilesLink

        @RequestMapping({"/samples/{sampleId}","/projects/{projectId}/samples/{sampleId}"})
public String getCorrectSampleFilesLink​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Redirect user to the project sequenceFile page. This was added to support links that previously existed and may be bookmarked. These url require the "/sequenceFiles" to prevent loading errors.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        String with the project sequence file URL

      • removeSequencingObjectFromSample

        @RequestMapping(value="/samples/{sampleId}/files/delete",
                method=POST)
public String removeSequencingObjectFromSample​(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes attributes,
                                               @PathVariable
                                               Long sampleId,
                                               @RequestParam
                                               Long fileId,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                               Locale locale)
        Remove a given SequencingObject from a sample
        Parameters:
        attributes - the redirect attributes where we can add flash-scoped messages for the client.
        sampleId - the Sample id
        fileId - The SequencingObject id
        request - HttpServletRequest
        locale - the locale specified by the browser.
        Returns:
        map stating the request was successful

public String getConcatenatePage​(@PathVariable
                                 Long sampleId,
                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get the page for concatenating SequencingObjects in a Sample
        Parameters:
        sampleId - the Sample to get files for
        model - model for the view
        Returns:
        name of the files concatenate page

      • concatenateSequenceFiles

        @RequestMapping(value={"/samples/{sampleId}/concatenate","/projects/{projectId}/samples/{sampleId}/concatenate"},
                method=POST)
public String concatenateSequenceFiles​(@PathVariable
                                       Long sampleId,
                                       @RequestParam(name="seq")
                                       Set<Long> objectIds,
                                       @RequestParam(name="filename")
                                       String filename,
                                       @RequestParam(name="remove",defaultValue="false",required=false)
                                       boolean removeOriginals,
                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Concatenate a collection of SequencingObjects
        Parameters:
        sampleId - the id of the Sample to concatenate in
        objectIds - the SequencingObject ids
        filename - base of the new filename to create
        removeOriginals - boolean whether to remove the original files
        model - model for the view
        request - the incoming HttpServletRequest
        Returns:
        redirect to the files page if successul
